actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to permit the exclusion from gross income of certain work-related sick pay received by New York City police officers and firefighters.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, certain work-related sick pay received by New York City police officers and firefighters for the three-year period ending May 9, 1983.

titles.title: A bill to permit the exclusion from gross income of certain work-related sick pay received by New York City police officers and firefighters.
